from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#                  .select(
#                      col("NSIPExaminationTimetableID"),
#                      col("caseReference"),
#                      col("published"),

#                      col("event.eventId").alias("eventId"),
#                      col("event.type").alias("type"),
#                      col("event.eventTitle").alias("eventTitle"),
#                      col("event.eventTitleWelsh").alias("eventTitleWelsh"),
#                      col("event.description").alias("description"),
#                      col("event.descriptionWelsh").alias("descriptionWelsh"),
#                      col("event.eventDeadlineStartDate").alias("eventDeadlineStartDate"),
#                      col("event.date").alias("date"),
#                      col("event.eventLineItems").alias("eventLineItems"),

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT DISTINCT 
                        CAST(NULL AS Long) as NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                        ,caseReference
                        ,NULL as published

                        ,CAST(ID AS Integer) As eventId
                        ,TypeOfExamination As type
                        ,Name As eventTitle
                        ,CAST(NULL As String) As eventTitleWelsh
                        ,Description As description
                        ,CAST(NULL As String) As descriptionWelsh
                        ,DeadlineStartDateTime As eventDeadlineStartDate
                        ,Date As date
                        ,NULL As eventLineItems

                        -- Start Horizon Fields Not in SB
                        ,Location
                        -- END Horizon Fields Not in SB

                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                        ,to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
FROM
    {horizon_table} AS Horizon
WHERE
    ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table})
ORDER BY caseReference

horizon_data_aggregated = horizon_data.groupBy('NSIPExaminationTimetableID', "caseReference", 'published', 'Location', 'Migrated', 'ODTSourceSystem', 'SourceSystemID', 'IngestionDate', 'ValidTo', 'RowID', 'IsActive').agg(
    collect_list(
        struct("eventId", "type", "eventTitle", "eventTitleWelsh", "description", "descriptionWelsh", "eventDeadlineStartDate", "date", "eventLineItems")
    ).alias("properties")
)

# .select(
#                      col("NSIPExaminationTimetableID"),
#                      col("caseReference"),
#                      col("published"),

#                      col("event.eventId").alias("eventId"),
#                      col("event.type").alias("type"),
#                      col("event.eventTitle").alias("eventTitle"),
#                      col("event.eventTitleWelsh").alias("eventTitleWelsh"),
#                      col("event.description").alias("description"),
#                      col("event.descriptionWelsh").alias("descriptionWelsh"),
#                      col("event.eventDeadlineStartDate").alias("eventDeadlineStartDate"),
#                      col("event.date").alias("date"),
#                      col("event.eventLineItems").alias("eventLineItems"),
                     
#                      col("Location"),
#                      col("Migrated"),
#                      col("ODTSourceSystem"),
#                      col("SourceSystemID"),
#                      col("IngestionDate"),
#                      col("ValidTo"),
#                      col("RowID"),
#                      col("IsActive")

#Establish aggregated view of attachmentIds
horizon_event_lineitems = horizon_data.groupBy("eventId").agg(collect_list("eventLineItems").alias("eventLineItems"))
horizon_data = horizon_data.drop("eventLineItems")
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_event_lineitems, on="eventId", how="inner")

#sort columns into same order as service bus
horizon_data = horizon_data.select(service_bus_data_flattened.columns)
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY eventId ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, eventId asc) AS NSIPExaminationTimetableID
    ,eventId
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS Migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY eventId ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_exam_timetable

%%sql
SELECT
    CurrentRow.NSIPExaminationTimetableID
    ,CurrentRow.eventId 
    ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
    ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
    ,CASE
        WHEN raw.eventId IS NOT NULL THEN 
            "1"
        ELSE 
            "0"
    END AS Migrated
    ,CurrentRow.IsActive
FROM
    vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
    LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base AS NextRow
        ON CurrentRow.eventId = NextRow.eventId
        AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
    LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT eventId FROM odw_harmonised_db.sb_nsip_exam_timetable) AS Raw
        ON CurrentRow.eventId = Raw.eventId 
    ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                            ,CurrentRow.eventId 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.eventId IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.eventId = NextRow.eventId
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT eventId FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_nsip_exam_timetable) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.eventId = Raw.eventId 
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                        ,adviceId
                        ,adviceReference
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,title
                        ,titleWelsh
                        ,from
                        ,agent
                        ,method
                        ,enquiryDate
                        ,enquiryDetails
                        ,enquiryDetailsWelsh
                        ,adviceGivenBy 
                        ,adviceDate
                        ,adviceDetails
                        ,adviceDetailsWelsh
                        ,status
                        ,redactionStatus
                        ,attachmentIds

                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,Section51Advice
                        ,EnquirerFirstName
                        ,EnquirerLastName
                        ,AdviceLastModified
                        ,AttachmentCount
                        ,AttachmentsLastModified
                        ,LastPublishedDate
                        ,WelshLanguage
                        ,CaseWorkType
                        --End Horizon only fields

                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                    IFNULL(CAST(NSIPExaminationTimetableID AS bigint), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceId AS integer), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseId AS integer), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(title AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(titleWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(from AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(agent AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(method AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDetails AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceGivenBy AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetails AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(status AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(redactionStatus AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(attachmentIds AS String), '.')

                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Section51Advice AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerFirstName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerLastName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AdviceLastModified AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AttachmentCount AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AttachmentsLastModified AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(LastPublishedDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(WelshLanguage AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(CaseWorkType AS String), '.')

                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")
